metadata.title: Crayobois - The pen you need
metadata.description: Crayobois is a Quebec-based woodworking microenterprise specializing in crafting high-quality wooden pens from various woods.

home.ourProductsDescription: Explore our selection of <bold>premium quality</bold> prefabricated products, including <bold>special editions</bold>. Our range includes pens, razors, keychains, mechanical pencils, and many other items.
home.handmadeDescription: Discover our unique pens, carefully crafted by <bold>Vincent Legros</bold> and proudly assembled in <bold>Outaouais, Quebec</bold>. Customize them to your preferences - wood, style, materials. Express your style with elegance.
